SEARCH
Package blog.model

Class PostRepository

java.lang.Object
blog.model.PostRepository
public class PostRepository extends Object
The PostRepository class is responsible for managing a collection of blog posts. It provides methods to add, delete, modify, and retrieve posts by author.
Version:
1.0
Author:
marcelkuczek

      public List<Post> getPostsByAuthor(String author)
      Retrieves a list of posts by a selecteed author.
      Parameters:
      author - The author's name to filter posts
      Returns:
      A list of posts written by the selected author

    • modifyTitle

      public void modifyTitle(String postTitleToModify, String newTitle)
      Modifies the title of an post.
      Parameters:
      postTitleToModify - The current title of the post to modify
      newTitle - The new title to set for the post
